high_descs: Turn left and move to the desk in the corner of the room.
Pick up the CD to the rear of the keys and to the left of the remote control on the desk.
Turn left and move towards the window then turn right and face the desk that has a lamp.
Turn on the desk lamp next to the keys on the desk.
anns.task_desc: Examine a CD using the light from a desk lamp.

high_descs: Pick up the CD on the middle of the desk.
Bring the CD to the lamp on the table.
Turn on the lamp on the table.
anns.task_desc: Examine the CD in the light on the table.

high_descs: Pick up the CD closest to the keys on the desk.
Turn left and head towards the lamp.
anns.task_desc: Examine a CD next to the light of a lamp.
